scripts.db-init: pipenv run python manage.py db init
scripts.db-migrate: pipenv run python manage.py db migrate
scripts.db-upgrade: pipenv run python manage.py db upgrade
scripts.db-downgrade: pipenv run python manage.py db downgrade
scripts.test-db: dropdb agency_test --if-exists && createdb agency_test && psql agency_test < agency_test.psql
scripts.test-full: npm run test-db && npm run test
